text: Farawo akati: “Munotenda maari ndisati ndakupai mvumo. Zvirokwazvo, uyu ndiye mukuru wenyu akakudzidzisai mapipi? Nekudaro zvirokwazvo, muchazvia zvenyu. Zvirokwazvo, ndichadambura maoko enyu uye makumbo enyu kumativi akapesana (ruoko rwerudyi negumbo rekuruboshwe kana kupindura), uye ndichakurovererai mose pamuchinjikwa.”
